file.name: odd_adapter.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: OpenDataDiscovery Adapter Contract
  version: 0.0.1
  description: OpenDataDiscovery Adapter Contract
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
paths:
  /entities:
    get:
      description: Provides list of available entities
      operationId: getDataEntities
      tags:
        - OpenDataDiscoveryAdapter
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: changed_since
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          description: Get data enitites updated after changed_since date
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './entities.yaml/#/components/schemas/DataEntityList'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /entities: get: operation "getDataEntities": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "./entities.yaml/#/components/schemas/DataEntityList": external "./entities.yaml/": file: local file reference is not allowed
